Package org.radarbase.management.repository

Interface SubjectRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Subject>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Subject>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.history.RevisionRepository<Subject,Long,Integer>
@RepositoryDefinition(domainClass=Subject.class, idClass=java.lang.Long.class) public interface SubjectRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.history.RevisionRepository<Subject,Long,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Subject>
Spring Data JPA repository for the Subject entity.

  • Method Details

    • countByGroupId

      @Query("SELECT count(*) from Subject subject WHERE subject.group.id = :group_id") long countByGroupId(@Param("group_id") Long groupId)

    • findAllByProjectNameAndAuthoritiesIn

      @Query(value="select distinct subject from Subject subject left join fetch subject.sources left join fetch subject.user user join user.roles roles where roles.project.projectName = :projectName and roles.authority.name in :authorities", countQuery="select distinct count(subject) from Subject subject left join subject.user user left join user.roles roles where roles.project.projectName = :projectName and roles.authority.name in :authorities") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Subject> findAllByProjectNameAndAuthoritiesIn(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, @Param("projectName") String projectName, @Param("authorities") List<String> authorities)

    • findOneWithEagerBySubjectLogin

      @Query("select subject from Subject subject left join fetch subject.sources WHERE subject.user.login = :login") Optional<Subject> findOneWithEagerBySubjectLogin(@Param("login") String login)

    • findAllBySubjectLogins

      @Query("select subject from Subject subject WHERE subject.user.login in :logins") List<Subject> findAllBySubjectLogins(@Param("logins") List<String> logins)

    • setGroupIdByIds

      @Modifying @Query("UPDATE Subject subject SET subject.group.id = :groupId WHERE subject.id in :ids") void setGroupIdByIds(@Param("groupId") Long groupId, @Param("ids") List<Long> ids)

    • unsetGroupIdByIds

      @Modifying @Query("UPDATE Subject subject SET subject.group.id = null WHERE subject.id in :ids") void unsetGroupIdByIds(@Param("ids") List<Long> ids)

    • findSourcesBySubjectId

      @Query("select subject.sources from Subject subject WHERE subject.id = :id") List<Source> findSourcesBySubjectId(@Param("id") Long id)

    • findSourcesBySubjectLogin

      @Query("select subject.sources from Subject subject WHERE subject.user.login = :login") List<Source> findSourcesBySubjectLogin(@Param("login") String login)

    • findOneByProjectNameAndExternalId

      @Query("select distinct subject from Subject subject left join fetch subject.sources left join fetch subject.user user join user.roles roles where roles.project.projectName = :projectName and subject.externalId = :externalId") Optional<Subject> findOneByProjectNameAndExternalId(@Param("projectName") String projectName, @Param("externalId") String externalId)

    • findOneByProjectNameAndExternalIdAndAuthoritiesIn

      @Query("select distinct subject from Subject subject left join fetch subject.sources left join fetch subject.user user join user.roles roles where roles.project.projectName = :projectName and roles.authority.name in :authorities and subject.externalId = :externalId") Optional<Subject> findOneByProjectNameAndExternalIdAndAuthoritiesIn(@Param("projectName") String projectName, @Param("externalId") String externalId, @Param("authorities") List<String> authorities)

    • findSubjectSourcesBySourceType

      @Query("select subject.sources from Subject subject left join subject.sources sources join sources.sourceType sourceType where sourceType.producer = :producer and sourceType.model = :model and sourceType.catalogVersion =:version and subject.user.login = :login") List<Source> findSubjectSourcesBySourceType(@Param("login") String login, @Param("producer") String producer, @Param("model") String model, @Param("version") String version)

    • findSubjectSourcesBySourceId

      @Query("select distinct subject.sources from Subject subject left join subject.sources sources where sources.sourceId= :sourceId and subject.user.login = :login") Optional<Source> findSubjectSourcesBySourceId(@Param("login") String login, @Param("sourceId") UUID sourceId)
